options.optionText: You seriously have that thing buzzing while she's standing right there?
options.responseText: Oh, you bet your sweet ass. She probably thinks it’s an air vent malfunction. Poor Purity Police are too busy jacking each other off with their eyes to notice me cumming in plain sight.

followUpOptions.optionText: You really don't give a fuck, do you?
followUpOptions.responseText: Sweetie, I haven’t given a fuck since the bombs dropped. If anything, I give out frustration.
